sourcesContent:
const color = {
  white: '#FFFFFF',
  emerald: '#164C57',
  lightEmerald: '#358494',
  salmon: '#F66B5F',
  redSalmon: '#DC4241',
  gradient: 'linear-gradient(270deg, #358494 0%, #F66B5E 100%)',
  blueText: '#1A2B43',
  grey: '#9199A4',
  darkBlue: '#0F1B2D',
};

const theme = {
  color,
  borderRounded: '61px',
  spacing: {
    none: '0px',
    xxs: '4px',
    xs: '6px',
    sm: '8px',
    md: '12px',
    lg: '14px',
    xl: '16px',
    xl2: '18px',
    xl3: '20px',
    xl4: '24px',
    xl5: '32px',
    xl6: '40px',
    xl7: '48px',
    xl8: '57px',
    xl9: '64px',
    xl10: '72px',
    xl11: '112px',
    xl111: '136px',
    xl121: '150px',
    xl12: '160px',
    xl131: '193px',
    xl13: '208px',
    xl14: '234px',
    mxl: '-15px',
    mxl11: '-112px',
    pxl11: '7%',
    pxl14: '11%',
    pxl15: '13%',
  },
  typography: {
    family:{
        sauceOne: 'OpenSauceOne, sans-serif',
        sauceSans:'OpenSauceSans, sans-serif'
    },
    size: {
      xxxs:'12',
      xxs: '16px',
      xs: '18px',
      sm: '20px',
      md: '2.2vw',
      lg: '7vw',
      xl: '6.5vw',
      xl2: '8vw',
      xl3: '5.5vw',
    }
  },
  sizing:{
    mainContainer: '1440px',
    mainLinksContainer: '912px',
    sayHiInput: '592px',
    sayHiText: '384px',
    sayHiFooter: '234px',
    thanksText: '844px',
    thanksLink: '430px',
    getInTouch: '350px',
    titleWithLink: '1165px',
    dropdownAbout: '585px',
    dropdownAboutContainer: '800px',
    dropdownWeDo: '696px',
    blogImageBig: '487px',
    blogImageSmall: '280px',
  },
  lineHeight: {
    xs: '0.8',
    sm: '1',
  },
};

export default theme;
